advancements.husbandry.infinite_pie.desc: Use a Dragon Egg to craft Infinite Pie
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.title: §9Infinite Pie Config
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.piHunger.too: §8§o[?]§7§o Adjusts the Hunger value given from eating Infinite Pie.
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.piSaturation: §8§o[?]§7§o Adjusts the Saturation value given from eating Infinite Pie.
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.piMaxStackSi: §8§o[?]§7§o Adjusts the maximum stack size of Infinite Pie.
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.piEatingSpee: §8§o[?]§7§o Adjusts the eating speed of Infinite Pie. 32 is the default food speed, 16 is like Melons.
infinite_pie.midnightconfig.piCooldown.t: §8§o[?]§7§o Whether or not Infinite Pie has an eating cooldown.
